nml_option.name: config_baroclinic_channel_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in baroclinic channel test case. Typical value is 20.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_baroclinic_channel_use_distances
nml_option.description: Logical flag that determines if locations of features are defined by distances of fractions. False means fractions.

nml_option.name: config_baroclinic_channel_surface_temperature
nml_option.description: Temperature of the surface in the northern half of the domain.

nml_option.name: config_baroclinic_channel_bottom_temperature
nml_option.description: Temperature of the bottom in the northern half of the domain.

nml_option.name: config_baroclinic_channel_temperature_difference
nml_option.description: Difference in the temperature field between the northern and southern halves of the domain.

nml_option.name: config_baroclinic_channel_gradient_width_frac
nml_option.description: Fraction of domain in Y direction the temperature gradient should be linear over.

nml_option.name: config_baroclinic_channel_gradient_width_dist
nml_option.description: Width of the temperature gradient around the center sin wave. Default value is relative to a 500km domain in Y.

nml_option.name: config_baroclinic_channel_bottom_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the bottom of the ocean for the baroclinic channel test case.

nml_option.name: config_baroclinic_channel_salinity
nml_option.description: Salinity of the water in the entire domain.

nml_option.name: config_baroclinic_channel_test_NH_solver
nml_option.description: parameter that modifies baroclinic channel to simply test the NH pressure solver

nml_option.name: config_baroclinic_channel_test_NH_solver_nondivergent
nml_option.description: forces vertical velocity to be divergence free for testing pressure solver

nml_option.name: config_baroclinic_channel_max_velocity
nml_option.description: maximum velocity in testing NH pressure solver

nml_option.name: config_baroclinic_channel_nwaves
nml_option.description: number of waves in the domain for the idealized sin/cos solution

nml_option.name: config_baroclinic_channel_make_periodic
nml_option.description: if true, force baroclinic channel to be periodic
